name: Mystic Midway: Rest in Pieces
description:
Mystic Midway: Rest in Pieces – Somewhere between heaven and earth stands the mystic midway. Its live action ‘Master of Cemeteries’ the humorously insulting Dr Dearth, welcomes you to his shooting gallery, Rest in Pieces! Fire away at ghosts, ghouls, and all things that go bump in the night. It’s so frightfully fun, you might never return!

Special features include:

  • Dr. Dearth in live video with a constant barrage of unwanted advice
  • Multiple players scores saved in the in the high score hall of fame
  • 15 elusive targets
  • 10 challenging game levels
  • Full fidelity CD soundtrack
